messages.message: Invalid sample in basic DFD block. The samples must match the expected samples of the VkFormat.
messages.details: DFD block #1 sample #2 samplePosition0 in basic DFD block is 42 but the expected value is 0 for VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8_UNORM.

messages.message: Unsupported multiple-sample format. Every sample position must be zero.
messages.details: DFD block #1 indicates multiple sample locations but multiple-sample formats are not supported.
